wikipedia_page.main: Romilly Sarah Weeks (15 December 1973 in Paddington, London) is an English journalist, currently working as a political correspondent and news presenter for ITV News.

response: * Romilly Weeks as a guest at dinner

Stewart has appeared twice on the celebrity editions of game show The Chase. His first appearance was on 19 October 2013. His second appearance was a Text Santa special on 20 December 2013 and featured his fellow ITV News presenters Romilly Weeks, Matt Barbet, and Charlene White.

response: *A celebrity special of The Chase aired at 17:00 on 20 December, featuring Bradley Walsh as host with celebrity contestants from the ITV News, Matt Barbet, Alastair Stewart, Romilly Weeks and Charlene White. Together, they raised £55,000 for the Text Santa appeal.
